name: Amberial: Nebulosa Realms (2008)
description:
The AmberBall is back in a huge new adventure with all that you requested !
22 new levels, time trials, and an insanely hard tower of glory.

I originally made this in 2008. I've now repackaged it as a windows executable game so it's still accessible. 

I am currently working on a complete remake of the concept which you can see at:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/917140/Amberial_Dreams/

Instructions:

Use the left and right arrows to move!

To acquire a lighting medal, complete a level under a certain time.

(Press left and right at the same time when you lose or win to retry)
